snippet: Japan's Kei Nishikori was at his aggressive best as he disarmed Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-4 6-2 6-4 to sweep into the last eight of the Australian Open for the third time on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Japan's Kei Nishikori was at his aggressive best as he disarmed Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-4 6-2 6-4 to sweep into the last eight of the Australian Open for the third time on Sunday.
